solution_line_template: On Monday, Shawna was short of {goal} - {monday} = <<{goal}-{monday}={monday_short}>>{monday_short} situps
On Tuesday, Shawna was short of {goal} - {tuesday} = <<{goal}-{tuesday}={tuesday_short}>>{tuesday_short} situps
On Wednesday, Shawna would have to do {goal} + {monday_short} + {tuesday_short} = <<{goal}+{monday_short}+{tuesday_short}={wednesday_needed}>>{wednesday_needed} situps
